AudioContextCreateMediaStreamSource.summary:
The createMediaStreamSource() method of the
Interface is used to create a new
object, given a media stream (say, from a
instance), the audio from which can then be played and manipulated.

remarks.para:
For more details about media stream audio source nodes, check out the {{
domxref("MediaStreamAudioSourceNode") }} reference page.

AudioContextCreateMediaStreamSource.returns:
A new object representing the audio node
whose media is obtained from the specified source stream.
